name: Killing War
overview: An AMOS based shareware title from War Production and released in 2000. This is a turn based strategy game for two players from Czechia. In the full version, the game contains 22 missions, 16 types of units, 4 to 10 music modules, a larger number of sounds and up to 8 missions for two players. The release of the final version of the game was planned for April 2000.
